position: Basic Roots | Raising funds for technology startups

experience.title: Founding Partner
experience.description: Fundraise and M&A advisory for early and growth-stage technology-driven businesses. We work with select businesses and partner with them across their lifecycle for strategic transactions and beyond that. We filter these aggressively to add maximum value for our clients as well as the VCs we work with. Our team brings in the best practices of Bulge Bracket Investment Banks and the agility that the new-age companies need. Some of the sectors that we have worked in are Edtech, Gaming, Fintech, Consumer Brands, eCommerce, HealthTech, B2B Manufacturing etc.

experience.title: Associate Founder
experience.description: The business is into manufacturing and B2B of designer or value added fabrics, ethnic readymade to retailers all across the country. We upscaled the supply within one year from Gujarat to small and large retailers in tier 2/3/4 cities. Managed sourcing, buying and manufacturing of fabrics and readymade ethnic wear line. With deep understanding of different textile markets in the country, the company is now expanding into newer categories and managed by a professional team.

experience.title: Asst. Vice President
experience.description: Origination and Relationship Team for Capital Market Transactions, M&A, Private Equity, Restructuring etc. Extensive experience in Deal Execution. Sector Focus - HealthCare and Pharma, Infrastructure (Roads) and FMCG.
